meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7734.

td.p: Arielle Lipshaw, a business analyst from Arlington, Massachusetts
Kristin Robbins, an attorney from Red Bank, New Jersey
Jack Dickey, a journalist from New York, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $46,802)

tr.td: MINE-APOLIS
X-Y-Z ABBREVIATIONS
TRANSPORTATION IN SONG
KING JAMES BIBLE QUOTES
MANY ARE CALLED
FEW ARE CHOSEN
